snippet.title: MythForce Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Inspired by 80s cartoons, MythForce unites swords & sorcery with gripping 1st-person combat in a roguelite adventure fit for Saturday mornings. Brave the dungeon alone or team up with friends in co-op mode for 4 people!

Listen to the Theme Song!
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/track/77zyliUJ8RQVJiYYYIwuO9?si=d5a6fcc23dec4a68&nd=1
Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/us/album/mythforce-feat-ruls-single/1617875280

Check out the store page & wishlist today: https://bit.ly/MythWishList
Sign up to get exclusive sneak-peeks! https://mythforce.com
Join the Early Access Conversation on Discord: https://bit.ly/discordmyth
